text: Good morning nanba! Semma day start aguthu
Traffic la stuck agitu iruken, waste of time
Movie semma bore adichuthu, time waste
Birthday wishes to my best friend!
Food delivery late ah vanthuchu, disappointed
Weekend vibes semma relaxing ah irukku
Work pressure romba high, stress aguthu
New project success! Team semma worked hard
Weather apdi semma pleasant ah irukku
